data.name: quest_biathlon_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limitation on the number of attempts to complete the specified conditions.
Primary condition: complete the mission conditions in the specified number of battles. If the number of remaining battles is fewer than the number of required completions, the current progress will be reset and the mission will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one, and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion. You can fail the secondary condition, but still complete the primary condition. In this case, the secondary condition will remain unavailable for completion until you start a new series of attempts.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_biathlon_with_limit_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limitation on the number of attempts to complete the specified conditions.
Primary condition: complete the mission conditions in the specified number of battles. If the number of remaining battles is fewer than the number of required completions, the current progress will be reset and the mission will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one, and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion. You can fail the secondary condition, but still complete the primary condition. In this case, the secondary condition will remain unavailable for completion until you start a new series of attempts.
Restrictions. By value: the mission has a particular minimum value for a battle. If this value is not reached, the result of this battle will not be counted. By time: only a result achieved within the specified time period is counted.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_every_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limitation on the number of attempts to complete the specified conditions.
The primary condition should be completed in each battle of a series. Failing in one battle breaks the series and the progress will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one, and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion. You can fail the secondary condition, but still complete the primary condition. In this case, the secondary condition will remain unavailable for completion until you start a new series of attempts.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_every_with_limit_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limitation on the number of attempts to complete the specified conditions.
The primary condition should be completed in each battle of a series. Failing in one battle breaks the series and the progress will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one, and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion. You can fail the secondary condition, but still complete the primary condition. In this case, the secondary condition will remain unavailable for completion until you start a new series of attempts.
Restrictions. By value: the mission has a particular minimum value for a battle. If this value is not reached, the result of this battle will not be counted. By time: only a result achieved within the specified time period is counted.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all earned progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_result_descr
data.value:
These missions are accumulative: you will have to complete the conditions over a number of battles.
Primary condition: over an unlimited number of battles, the results of each battle are added together until the required result is reached.
The secondary condition is completed within one battle (its progress is not added). To receive rewards, you must complete this condition the required number of times, as well as complete the primary mission condition.
Multiplier: completion of the secondary condition in a battle provides you with a special multiplier that multiplies all achieved progress in the primary condition by the specified value.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_result_with_limit_descr
data.value:
These missions are accumulative: you will have to complete the conditions over a number of battles.
Primary condition: over an unlimited number of battles, the results of each battle are added together until the required result is reached.
The secondary condition is completed within one battle (its progress is not added). To receive rewards, you must complete this condition the required number of times, as well as complete the primary mission condition.
Multiplier: completion of the secondary condition in a battle provides you with a special multiplier that multiplies all achieved progress in the primary condition by the specified value.
Restrictions. By value: the mission has a particular minimum value for a battle. If this value is not reached, the result of this battle will not be counted. By time: only a result achieved within the specified time period is counted.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_standart_descr
data.value:
These missions must be completed in one battle.
To receive rewards for the secondary condition (together with the primary condition or to improve the result), a player must complete the primary condition. Otherwise, the mission will not be considered completed and no rewards will be provided for the completion of the secondary condition.

data.name: quest_success_descr
data.value:
These missions are accumulative: you will have to complete the conditions within a number of battles (in a random order).
The primary condition must be completed within the required number of battles, in a random order. Only successful battles will be counted; the number of attempts is unlimited.
The secondary condition is completed within one battle (the progress is not added), over an unlimited number of battles. To receive rewards, you must complete this condition the required number of times, as well as complete the primary condition of the mission.
Multiplier: completion of the primary and secondary conditions in a battle adds the results of 2 or 3 battles depending on the multiplier.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_success_with_limit_descr
data.value:
These missions are accumulative: you will have to complete the conditions within a number of battles (in a random order).
The primary condition must be completed within the required number of battles, in a random order. Only successful battles will be counted; the number of attempts is unlimited.
The secondary condition is completed within one battle (the progress is not added). To receive rewards, you must complete this condition the required number of times, as well as complete the primary condition of the mission.
Multiplier: completion of the primary and secondary conditions in a battle adds the results of 2 or 3 battles depending on the multiplier.
Restrictions. By value: the mission has a particular minimum value for a battle. If this value is not reached, the result of this battle will not be counted. By time: only a result achieved within the specified time period is counted.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all earned progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_sum_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limited number of attempts to complete the specified condition.
Primary condition: the results of each battle are added together. If the required value is not reached and there are no attempts left, the mission is considered failed and the mission progress is reset. The mission will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.

data.name: quest_sum_with_limit_descr
data.value:
Each mission of this type has a limited number of attempts to complete the specified condition.
Primary condition: the results of each battle are added together. If the required value is not reached and there are no attempts left, the mission is considered failed and the mission progress is reset. The mission will be started all over again.
The secondary condition is similar to the primary one and has its own completion progress. This condition is more complex and requires the same number of battles for completion.
Restrictions. By value: the mission has a particular minimum value for a battle. If this value is not reached, the result of this battle will not be counted. By time: only a result achieved within the specified time period is counted.
IMPORTANT: when cancelling a mission, all progress will be lost.
